name: Shape of U
description:
We are Cloak and Sword Games, a small indie developer based in Montreal. This is our first completed project, done in 5 days for the UE4 Spring Jam. We decided to make this sort of hybrid between a rythm game and a platformer. The difficulty curve is very steep, forgive us about that hahaha! We hope you enjoy it a little bit at least!

Controls:

1/ Q, 2/W, 3/ E to change shapes

A & D or arrows to move left or right

Space bar to jump

Change shapes to go through the gates, don't fall off the track and don't hit the spikes!

The team:

Thomas Forest -> thomas.forest94@hotmail.com // Programming

Alexandre Brisebois -> alexandroo.brisebois@gmail.com // Level design

Maximilien Quintal -> maximipet@hotmail.com // 3D modeling
